name: Shaggy Mane
description: The Shaggy Mane (Coprinus comatus), also called Shaggy Ink Cap or Lawyer's Wig, is an excellent edible mushroom with characteristic cylindrical shape and scaly white surface. It often grows in unexpected places like lawns, roadsides and on fertilized soils. Unique is its deliquescence - the mature gills dissolve into a black, spore-containing liquid. It is being studied for antidiabetic and antitumoral properties.
